title: with the removal of Clown9
body: can we now have animated loading screens? I'd say 85% of skins/champions combined already have them animated. so it wouldn't take too long to put them into loading screen.

replies.body: This would be very technically complex, slow down loading drastically for some players, and probably require gigabytes of downloads.
option to turn it off just like the log-in screen o.o
About 700 skins in league, assuming around 10MB per login screen, with reduced scale and resolution.. You do the math on the required filesizes.
